titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on mixtures of Foramsulfuron and Iodosulfuron-methyl-sodium.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/19/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on mixtures of Foramsulfuron and Iodosulfuron-methyl-sodium.
